GSD.description:
soundwire: cadence: Don't overwrite msg->buf during write commands

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.150 by commit f04a673d4a27438d19b08a4d2842c5426b1cbeb5. For more details please see the references link.
